name: augur
description: Web client for Augur, a prediction markets platform

scripts.build: parallelshell 'mkdir target' 'npm run copyAssets' 'npm run build:js' 'npm run build:css'
scripts.copyAssets: parallelshell 'npm run copyAssets:html' 'npm run copyAssets:js' 'npm run copyAssets:css' 'npm run copyAssets:fonts' 'npm run copyAssets:tpl'
scripts.copyAssets:js: parallelshell 'copyfiles -f node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.js target/dist/jquery' 'copyfiles -f node_modules/augur.js/dist/augur.js target/dist/augur' 'copyfiles -f node_modules/ui-router/release/angular-ui-router.js target/dist/angular/ui-router' 'copyfiles -f node_modules/angular/angular.js target/dist/angular' 'copyfiles -f node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.js target/dist/bootstrap/js' 'copyfiles -f node_modules/requirejs/require.js target/dist/requirejs' 'copyfiles -f node_modules/requirejs-text/text.js target/dist/requirejs/plugins' ' copyfiles -f src/config/requirejs-main-config.js target/config' 'copyfiles -f node_modules/ipfs-api/dist/ipfsapi.min.js target/dist/ipfs-api'
scripts.// copyAssets:tpl: add minification - then we won't have to copy tpls because they will be inlined into the code
